title: Abstract C012: Evaluation of skin cancer screening education provided by dermatologists with The Sun Bus for medical students
details: EA Martin Lopez, H Riva, SK Kichena, D Lovasz, B Kan… - … Epidemiology, Biomarkers & …, 2024
abstract: Introduction: Medical student curriculum is lacking in standardized training of skills for conducting the skin cancer screening examination. Dermatology is not a standard clinical rotation during medical school, and many medical students do not have much …
